title.rendered: STEDI VW AMAROK HEADLIGHT PIGGY BACK ADAPTOR

content.rendered:
Volkswagen Amarok Driving Light Piggy Back High Beam Adapter

DETAILS

Specifically designed to suit the Volkswagen Amarok (All Models).

The easy solution for wiring up your Driving Lights with no need for splicing, tapping or soldering as it is a direct Plug & Play install.

Designed to work with all STEDI Quick Fit Wiring Harnesses.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CONNECTOR TYPE 10 Pin
FITS VOLKSWAGEN AMAROK: All Models

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Volkswagen Amarok High beam Adapter

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI VW AMAROK HEADLIGHT PIGGY BACK ADAPTOR

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
